And it be \w told|strong="H5046"\w* thee, and thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*, and \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3190"\w*, and, behold, \add it be\add* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*, \add and\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w certain|strong="H3559"\w*, \add that\add* such \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* is \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

Then shalt thou bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or that \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, which have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* that \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, unto thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \add even\add* that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or that \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, and shalt \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* them with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, till they \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

At the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, or \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, shall he that is worthy of \w death|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; \add but\add* at the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* he shall not be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

The \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* shall be \w first|strong="H7223"\w* upon him to put him to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0314"\w* the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. So thou shalt \w put|strong="H1197"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w away|strong="H1197"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

¶ If there arise a \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* too \w hard|strong="H6381"\w* for thee in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, between \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, between \w plea|strong="H1779"\w* and \w plea|strong="H1779"\w*, and between \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* and \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w*, \add being\add* \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* of \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: then shalt thou \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*;

And thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and unto the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* that shall be in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w*; and they shall \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee the \w sentence|strong="H1697"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*:

And thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w sentence|strong="H6310"\w*, which they of that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* shall \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee; and thou shalt \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that they \w inform|strong="H3384"\w* thee:

According to the \w sentence|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which they shall \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee, and according to the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* which they shall \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee, thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: thou shalt not \w decline|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w sentence|strong="H1697"\w* which they shall \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee, \add to\add* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, nor \add to\add* the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w presumptuously|strong="H2087"\w*, and will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* there before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, or unto the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, even that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: and thou shalt put \w away|strong="H1197"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 17.12 \ft and will…: Heb. not to hearken\f*
And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and do no more \w presumptuously|strong="H2102"\w*.

¶ When thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, and shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, and shalt \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, and shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over me, like as all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* me;

Thou shalt in any \w wise|strong="H7760"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add him\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over thee, whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*: \add one\add* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* shalt thou \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over thee: thou \w mayest|strong="H3201"\w* not \w set|strong="H5414"\w* a \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* over thee, which \add is\add* not thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

But he shall not \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* to himself, nor cause the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to the end that he should \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: forasmuch as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, Ye shall \w henceforth|strong="H3254"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* no more that \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

Neither shall he \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* to himself, that his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* not away: neither shall he \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* to himself \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And it shall be, when he \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of his \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, that he shall \w write|strong="H3789"\w* him a \w copy|strong="H4932"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w* out of \add that which is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*:

And it shall be with him, and he shall \w read|strong="H7121"\w* therein all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: that he may \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w* and these \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them:

That his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* be not lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* above his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and that he turn not \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, \add to\add* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, or \add to\add* the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*: to the end that he may \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add his\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in his \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, he, and his \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
